item.title: Automating Building in Public
item.description: As I mentioned in my previous post, I have begun building my personal site to post projects I’m working on. I’ve recently been learning about “Building in Public” and central to it is to maintain constant communication with the public. I thought that it would be great if I could post links to my personal site on Twitter. That way my followers could instantly see any new updates I’ve made.
